smithy.api#examples.title: To retrieve multiple items from a table
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example reads multiple items from the Music table using a batch of three GetItem requests.  Only the AlbumTitle attribute is returned.

smithy.api#examples.title: To add multiple items to a table
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example adds three new items to the Music table using a batch of three PutItem requests.

smithy.api#examples.title: To delete an item
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example deletes an item from the Music table.

smithy.api#examples.title: To delete a table
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example deletes the Music table.

smithy.api#examples.title: To determine capacity limits per table and account, in the current AWS region
smithy.api#examples.documentation: The following example returns the maximum read and write capacity units per table, and for the AWS account, in the current AWS region.

smithy.api#examples.title: To read an item from a table
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example retrieves an item from the Music table. The table has a partition key and a sort key (Artist and SongTitle), so you must specify both of these attributes.

smithy.api#examples.title: To list tables
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example lists all of the tables associated with the current AWS account and endpoint.

smithy.api#examples.title: To add an item to a table
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example adds a new item to the Music table.

smithy.api#examples.title: To query an item
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example queries items in the Music table. The table has a partition key and sort key (Artist and SongTitle), but this query only specifies the partition key value. It returns song titles by the artist named "No One You Know".

smithy.api#examples.title: To scan a table
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example scans the entire Music table, and then narrows the results to songs by the artist "No One You Know". For each item, only the album title and song title are returned.

smithy.api#examples.title: To update an item in a table
smithy.api#examples.documentation: This example updates an item in the Music table. It adds a new attribute (Year) and modifies the AlbumTitle attribute.  All of the attributes in the item, as they appear after the update, are returned in the response.
